summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Company Name (Secondary) field relocation from Additional Info tab to Basic Info tab. All required functionality is working correctly - field appears only when Order Type is set to Company Order, is properly positioned in Basic Info tab alongside Name of Firm and Case ID fields, and is no longer present in Additional Info tab.
passed_tests: Navigation to New Order form from dashboard
Basic Info tab displays correctly with all required fields
Company Name (Secondary) field is NOT visible when no order type is selected
Company Name (Secondary) field is NOT visible when Order Type is Cash
Company Name (Secondary) field IS visible when Order Type is Company
Company Name (Secondary) field is positioned correctly alongside Name of Firm and Case ID fields in Basic Info tab
Company Name (Secondary) field has correct label 'Company Name (Secondary)'
Company Name (Secondary) field is NOT present in Additional Info tab
Form layout and responsiveness in Basic Info tab with company fields
Field conditional visibility logic works correctly
Tab navigation between Basic Info and Additional Info works

success_percentage.backend: N/A (backend testing not required for this feature)
